name: Eye For Symmetry, 0.5%
description: Category: IPA Style: Other Heady, DEYA juice, in low alc form! This IPA is brewed in our house style and leans on a heavy dry hop of Mosaic BBC, Mosaic Cryo, Mosaic Hyperboost, El Dorado BBC, Moteuka, Motueka SubZero Hop Kief and Nelson Sauvin SubZero Hop Kief. 50cl Can

name: Nitro Stout 0.5% 'AF', 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: Porter / Stout LOST PIER NITRO STOUT ‚Äî 0.5% ABV All the creaminess. None of the compromise and none of the global corporation bad taste....... Say hello to our brand new Nitro Stout, a 0.5% black stout that delivers the full flavour and indulgent body of your favourite creamy Irish stout‚Äîwithout the alcohol. Crack the can and the widget fires into life, giving that unmistakable hiss as it surges into a tight, thick, cloud-like foam. Smooth, soft and velvety, each sip brings gentle chocolate, subtle roasty malt, and that signature creamy finish nitro drinkers love. Rich. Creamy. Completely sessionable. Nitro, but make it Lost Pier. 44cl Can

name: Nolia - New Zealand Special Edition, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA A special edition of our premium alcohol free IPA, saturated in double helpings of super fresh, all New Zealand hops. Hazier, juicer and hangover-free with flavours of lime, white grape and passionfruit. 44cl Can

name: Nothing Ventured, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: Pale Ale Alcohol Free West Coast Pale Exploring a classic style at a fraction of the percentage, this is a super crisp, hop-forward experience that still packs a punch. Bold, clean & replete with a dank pine & citrus peel that harks back to the Santa Rosa, CA original using cutting edge hop extracts & alcohol-free production techniques. Nothing Ventured, Nothing Gained Vegan. 44cl Can

name: Cosmic Dust AF, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: IPA Finally it's here! Our beloved Cosmic Dust has been reimagined as a non-alc, just in time for Dry January but hopefully for the foreseeable future as well. Featuring all of the punch of the full fat version but at a clear-headed 0.5% ABV, this new release has been delighting customers at our taproom over Christmas and is now on general sale for your enjoyment. Snap it up before it's all gone! 44cl Can

name: Kopra, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: IPA For our last release of the year, we teamed up with our friends at Bundobust to dream up a low-alcohol DDH Pale, Kopra. This hoppy little number lets Sabro take the lead with a hit of creamy coconut, but we wanted to round that classic flavour with a big, juicy punch. For that, we added a drop of Yakima Chiefs Citra Hyperboost hop product. This concentrated hop oil extract amplifies the hop aromatics for a bold, hoppy experience. Coconut, bright citrus of Lemon & Lime, and a dose of Blood Orange to finish. No need to sacrifice flavour this January for your low-alcohol needs. 44cl Can

name: Lychee & Watermelon Aviation Sour, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: Sour This special collaboration beer is a take on one of Bundobust‚Äôs most popular cocktails, a lychee aviation. We‚Äôve dialled up the fruitness with the addition of watermelon and ginger to keep the robustness that you expect from a cocktail. A harmonious concoction of herbs and spices including blackberry leaf, ancho chillies and bitter orange peel have been heavily steeped in this brew to infuse every last drop with bursts of complex and luxurious flavours. 44cl Can

name: Lark AF, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA Our latest collaboration with alcohol free virtuosos We Can Be Friends is a heavily hopped, full bodied IPA jam-packed with citrus intensity. The Citra and Motueka dry hop pops with grapefruit soda, mandarin peel and lime zest, offset with sweet alphonso mango and honeydew melon. Big haze, clear heads. 44cl Can

name: Nolia, 0.5%
description: Category: IPA Style: American This premium alcohol free IPA is saturated in super fresh hops ‚Äì hand-selected from individual farms in the Yakima Valley, US and in Nelson, NZ. Hazy, juicy and hangover-free with flavours of apricot, mango and lime mojitos. Less = More. 44cl Can

name: Margarita AF Gose, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: Sour It's Margarita time! We've teamed up with Macclesfield Coffee Shop Yas Bean for this one and decided a low alcohol Margarita could be a great summer sipper. A boatload of fresh Lime juice and a touch of salt make this a super refreshing beverage. The salt is well balanced with the lime keeping the sour flavour at a very enticing level. Salted rims are not mandatory to enjoy this Marg. 44cl Can

name: Sonoma AF, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: Pale Ale Sonoma now has an alcohol free sibling! Sonoma, but not as you know it! Classic Citra & Mosaic hops are balanced together in perfect harmony, creating that instantly-recognisable flavour we all know and love. We think Sonoma is the perfect tipple for every occasion, so we've gone and brewed a batch that you can enjoy whenever, wherever... This is an uncompromising alcohol free version of our classic session pale, evoking sun-drenched beer gardens and Sunday day sessions in every sip to bring that post-work pint feeling to your more sensible evenings. 44cl Can

name: Second Week Of Dry January // 6 Pack
description: A handpicked six showcasing just how good alcohol-free beer has become, bold hops, big flavour, zero compromise. üçâ 1 x Cloudwater Brew Co. Lychee & Watermelon Aviation SourA cocktail-inspired sour brewed with Bundobust. Lychee, watermelon and ginger layered with herbs, spices, chilli and bitter orange peel for a complex, luxurious finish. üåû 1 x Track Brewing Company Sonoma AFThe alcohol-free sibling of the much-loved Sonoma. Classic Citra & Mosaic hops bring soft citrus, tropical notes and that unmistakable ‚Äúpost-work pint‚Äù vibe. üá≥üáø 1 x Nolia New Zealand Special Edition IPAA hazy, premium AF IPA loaded with fresh New Zealand hops. Juicy lime, white grape and passionfruit with a smooth, full body ‚Äî all without the hangover. üå≤ 1 x Left Handed Giant Nothing VenturedAlcohol-free West Coast Pale. Crisp, clean and hop-forward with dank pine, citrus peel and a proper old-school West Coast edge. Vegan. üçç 1 x Sureshot Brewing You‚Äôll Never Be Alone AgainHazy AF IPA brewed with We Can Be Friends. Dry-hopped with Citra & Nelson Sauvin for bold fruity flavours, a soft body and classic Sureshot colour. üåå 1 x Gravity Well Brewing Co. Cosmic Dust AFThe fan-favourite pale ale, reimagined. All the punch of the original with bright hops and balanced bitterness, finished at a clear-headed 0.5%.

name: Wild Juice Chase, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: Pale Ale Talus and Citra hops pair harmoniously with mango and passionfruit to create an exceptional, soft and pillowy Juicy DDH Pale Ale. 44cl Can

name: NEIPA the Cosmic Turtle, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA A journey through space and time‚Ä¶ complete and utter inner peace‚Ä¶ an inter-dimensional cosmic turtle; what do these three things have in common? Nope, it‚Äôs not Jeff Bezos, but our AF NEIPA, which is absolutely out of this world. This New England IPA has a beautifully pillowy mouthfeel accompanied by a phenomenal fruity aroma and taste, all owed to the truckload of hops that went into it - we‚Äôre talking Citra, Mosaic, Amarillo and El Dorado....see truck loads. If you can‚Äôt afford to fly yourself into the great beyond on a rocket ship, take yourselves on a cosmic journey with our NEIPA instead, it‚Äôs incredible. 44cl Can

name: Heaven & Helles, 0.5%
description: Category: Lager Style: Helles The classic German hop duo of Tettnanger and Hallertauer Mittelfr√ºher create a beautiful blend of light floral and herbal aromas in this gluten free helles lager. 44cl Can

name: First Week Of Dry January // 6 Pack
description: Dry January Survival Pack( 0.5%)6 beers. 6 breweries. 0 regrets. A proper alcohol-free line-up, built from some of the best breweries doing low-and-no beer right now. No filler, no sad stand-ins, just flavour-forward AF beers that actually hold up. What‚Äôs inside (1 x of each): üç∫ 1 x Lark AF ‚Äì 0.5% | Track Brewing Co. x We Can Be FriendsA heavily hopped, full-bodied AF IPA bursting with citrus energy. Expect grapefruit soda, mandarin peel and lime zest, layered with sweet Alphonso mango and honeydew melon. Big haze, clear heads.44cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in Manchester üç∫ 1 x ZEUS ‚Äì 0.5% | We Can Be FriendsA clean, crisp non-alcoholic lager hopped with Saaz and Riwaka. Bright, refreshing and quietly expressive ‚Äî all snap and balance, with enough hop character to keep things interesting.Untappd rating: 3.644cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in London üç∫ 1 x PSYCH! ‚Äì 0.5% | Verdant Brewing Co.Six months of recipe tweaking went into this one. Crisp, clear and seriously hoppy, using clever yeast and classic brewing techniques. Packed with Chinook, Mosaic, Simcoe, Citra and El Dorado. Dry January or not, this drinks like the real deal.44cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in Penryn, Cornwall üç∫ 1 x Eye For Symmetry ‚Äì 0.5% | DEYA Brewing CompanyDEYA juice, but make it low-alc. A heavy Mosaic-led dry hop with El Dorado, Motueka and Nelson Sauvin SubZero Hop Kief brings all the aroma and saturation you‚Äôd expect from their full-strength IPAs.50cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in Cheltenham üç∫ 1 x Big Nothing (Simcoe & Nelson Sauvin) ‚Äì 0.5% | Donzoko Brewing CompanyBright, clean and snappy. Zesty citrus upfront, ripe tropical notes underneath, finishing dry and refreshing. Proof that AF doesn‚Äôt need to shout to impress.33cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in Newcastle upon Tyne üç∫ 1 x NEIPA the Cosmic Turtle ‚Äì 0.5% | Below Brew Co.Soft, pillowy mouthfeel with a huge hop bill of Citra, Mosaic, Amarillo and El Dorado. Bursting with fruity aroma and flavour ‚Äî a proper New England IPA experience, minus the booze.44cl Can ‚Äì Brewed in Bath

name: Fresh , 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: IPA Fresh Our first foray into Alcohol free beer. Designed to match the hop impact and body of our alcoholic New England IPA's. 44cl Can

name: On Dry Land, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA On Dry Land is our first foray into non-alcoholic beer. After much experimentation, we're proud to present what will be the first of man non-alcoholic brews. Crafted to mirror the characteristics of our core lPAs. it's packed with hops and delivers a smooth, juicy mouthfeel. We hope you en this flavorful, non-alcoholic IPA. 44cl Can

name: Half Day Hazy, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA The Half Day Hazy, perfect for every occasion. Be it an extended holiday sesh with your pals or feet up in your favourite solo spot, this fruity hazy pale ale lets your heart escape while still letting you wrap up a hard day‚Äôs work. Whether you've got a half day off or a half day left, our tropical sunshine in a can will take you halfway to a holiday. Pairs well with yummy stuff and holds up before, during or after a few normal ones. Knock-off without the knock-ons, go to your happy place and take a half day on us. You've earned it. 37.5cl Can

name: Arosa AF, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: Lager Arosa AF is the latest beer to join our Alcohol Free ranks - alongside our Sonoma AF! Arosa AF is the sister beer to our beloved Arosa Helles; uncompromisingly crisp, delicate and refreshing - but with zero chance of waking up with a sore head in the morning... 44cl Can

name: Cheat Codes, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: IPA Ultra refreshing super low alcohol IPA with bright zesty fruit notes. Crack the Cheat Codes, take a sip, power up! Water, Barley (Gluten), Oats, Wheat (Gluten), Hops, Yeast 44cl Can

name: Another Lager, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: Lager Brewed to wash down a schnitty special - with chips if you're feeling cute. The beer for when you reach the end of the craft rainbow and your'e fangin' for a pot of gold or you've been workin' the plough and you want a big cold beer... er, now. 37.5cl Can

name: Big Nothing Simcoe, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Style: Pale Ale Alcohol Free Beer dry hopped with Nelson Sauvin and Simcoe. Bright and clean with a zesty citrus kick and ripe tropical flavours that lead to a refreshingly dry finish / 0.5% 33cl Can

name: You'll Never Be Alone Again, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: IPA Alcohol free IPA brewed in collaboration with We Can Be Friends. Dry hopped with Citra & Nelson Sauvin, this beer brings the same great hoppiness as our full-fat IPAs - without the alcohol. Expect a full, hazy body, pronounced fruity flavours, and signature colour. So come on! 44cl Can

name: Sorbetto V4, 0.5%
description: Category: Non-Alcoholic Beer Style: Sour The latest release of our AF lactic fermented sour beer, made with strawberry, cherry and limes. This is the fourth iteration of Sorbetto - as with previous iterations, the cherry and lime base gives a strong and punchy backbone to the beer , and this time with overlaid it with strawberry. The combination has worked wonderfully, giving a highly pleasing, lightly acidic AF sour beer. 44cl Can
